stadium.name: The Aegis Field
stadium.description: A pristine field within the main temple compound, used as the central training ground for the Shield. The pitch is bordered by the library and monastery, and is said to be protected by the twin lights, Dawn's Hope and Silver Twilight.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Re-taping their shield's handle with fresh leather.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Drinking a full waterskin of lukewarm water.
Drawing a detailed, anatomically incorrect diagram of a troll's head.
Passing a 'team luckstone' from player to player without speaking.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Jogging three laps around the perimeter of the field.
Kissing their biceps and whispering words of encouragement to them.
Trying to teach a stray dog a complicated and useless new trick.
Challenging a spectator to a game of tic-tac-toe in the dirt.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame:
Well hello there, sports fans! This is Nok the Corrupter, your favorite demonic voice of the airwaves, coming to you live and loud from the almost nauseatingly clean Aegis Field in Haven! üèüÔ∏è We are kicking off the Losers Bracket in this high-stakes Best of 5 series, and boy oh boy, the tension is thicker than a dragon's hide! The Haven Lights and the New Monteforte Chaos Creatures are meeting again, but this time, the stakes are for survival! Whoever loses this series is heading home for good, and isn't that just a delightful thought? 

The stadium here at the Temple of Light Compound is usually so quiet you can hear a saint sneeze, but today, the rowdy Monteforte fans have brought enough noise to rattle the Twinlights themselves! I see Lian Denton over there for the Chaos Creatures, currently downing a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup! Now that's what I call a pre-game ritual, folks! On the other side, Riffle Harrington is hopping to the starting line after tying his bootlaces together. It‚Äôs a bit silly, isn't it? But hey, if it helps him heal those 'heroes,' I suppose we can't complain! ‚òï 

The atmosphere is absolutely electric, with the twin lights of Dawn's Hope and Silver Twilight shining down on us! We've got an open bar today, so I expect the fans‚Äîand maybe a few players‚Äîto be seeing double by the fourth quarter! I saw Sir Tanos earlier looking particularly grumpy; I think the noise from the street performers is interrupting his brooding! God King Artorias is probably off making friends with some butterflies, leaving the real work to these athletes! 

As the whistle approaches, you can feel the desperation in the air! The Chaos Creatures are looking to prove that rebellion can thrive even in the center of Haven, while the Lights are desperately trying to protect their home turf. With a field this pristine, it's almost a shame we're about to cover it in mud and blood‚Äîalmost! Let‚Äôs get ready for some bone-crunching, ball-dunking action as we find out who really belongs in the playoff sun! üí•
postGame:
Holy cow, what a defensive masterclass! Nok the Corrupter here, and my horns are still tingling from the sheer impact of those hits! The New Monteforte Chaos Creatures have drawn first blood in this Best of 5 series with a grit-your-teeth 1 to 0 victory over the Haven Lights! It was a low-scoring game on the board, but the injury list was longer than a money priest's ledger, just the way we like it! üèÜ 

The action started with a bang in the center field when Placido Kora decided she didn't like the look of Zwart Bunns' face! Kora absolutely leveled him, sending Zwart straight to the sidelines with a nasty injury! Talk about an early wake-up call for the home crowd! The Lights were stumbling around their own Hallowed Ground like they'd spent too much time at the open bar before the whistle! üöë 

But Placido wasn't done yet, oh no! Just moments later, she caught Shiroma Salim with a tackle that sounded like a dry branch snapping in a graveyard! Another injury for the Lights! You could practically hear the monastery library rattling from the force of it! It's a miracle anyone was left to hold the ball for those virtuous Havenites, who seem to have forgotten that prayer is no substitute for a good block! ü¶¥ 

There was plenty of back-and-forth in the mud, with both teams fumbling like they had butter on their gauntlets! Tucker Hett showed off some real criminal cunning by intercepting a wild pass from Tybi Reo! It was a beautiful theft, the kind of play that would make Dima the shadow king nod in approval! The Chaos Creatures were just hungrier for that leather troll head today, despite the Lights' home-field advantage! üèà 

The Lights tried to mount a comeback, with Tybi Reo showing she has a mean streak of her own! She managed to flatten Wolbrom Ariella, giving the Monteforte crew a taste of their own medicine! It‚Äôs always refreshing to see the heroes get their hands dirty, even if they do look ridiculous doing it! They were scrambling to pick up the ball in the center field, but the defense held firm! üé≠ 

By halftime, the healers were working harder than a warlock at a soul auction! Riffle Harrington and Lian Denton were patching up players faster than they could be carried off! The break gave everyone a chance to refill their tankards, and I suspect some of that ritual sangria from Elspeth Ortell was being shared under the table! The drunkenness was certainly starting to show in some of those wild passes! üçπ 

When the second half kicked off, the violence only intensified! Boulanger Procto decided to take over the game, showing off his broadsword expertise with a hit on Berkin Waters that sent him packing! It was a masterpiece of defensive play, making sure the Lights couldn't even sniff the end zone! Procto was moving with a grace that Governor-King Zenku could only dream of! üõ°Ô∏è 

Placido Kora continued her reign of terror by injuring Riffle Heyde! Honestly, Kora should be given a medal for community service for the amount of dental work she performed today! The Haven Lights were dropping like flies, and the Shield's Watch was looking more like a Shield's Nap! It's hard to protect the goal when you're busy staring at the stars from your back! üïØÔ∏è‚ùå 

Boulanger Procto then put the final touch on his defensive clinic by taking Tybi Reo out of the game with a thunderous tackle! With the Haven defense in shambles and their star players nursing bruises, the way was finally cleared! It was the kind of opening you could drive a siege engine through, and Monteforte knew exactly what to do with the opportunity! üî® 

Then came the moment of glory! Mouldon Earl snagged the ball, dodged a desperate lunge from the defense, and sprinted into the end zone for a thunderous dunk! The crowd at Aegis Field went silent while the visiting Monteforte fans erupted in cheers that surely woke up the High Prince! üèÄ That 1-0 lead was all they needed to seal the deal in this grind-fest! 

The game ended with the Haven Lights desperately trying to respond, but the Chaos Creatures were there to shut the door! Boulanger Procto was a one-man wall, blocking everything they threw at him! It was a total failure for the holy team in their own backyard! I bet even Sir Artorias is embarrassed to be associated with such a lack of coordination! üíÉ 

So, the New Monteforte Chaos Creatures take a 1-0 lead in this Best of 5 series! They came into the lion's den and walked out with the prize! The Haven Lights better start praying to those twin lights for some actual talent, because at this rate, the series will be over before they can finish their next hymn! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off to find a cold drink! Stay brutal, Osterra! üéôÔ∏èüòà
